Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

Editor's Notes

Former § 29-938 has been recodified as § 29A-938.

DC CODE § 29-938

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.identifier: 3 of this title shall apply to associations formed under this chapter, except to the extent that it is in conflict with this chapter

heading.catch_text: Chapter 3 of this title applicable to associations.
